title: Profile stitch
description: Details about the IDs that were joined by profile stitching.

xdm:profileStitchID.title: Profile stitch ID
xdm:profileStitchID.description: The identity of the segment or snapshot definition in with the domain of the specific system that processes that type of segment.

xdm:version.title: Version
xdm:version.description: The version of the profile stitch definition used and is useful for debugging.
